section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on February 8, 2026. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation affecting this section, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Definitions.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 1102 of Fiscal Year 2022 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-159, Aug. 23, 2021, 68 DCR 008602).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 4 of Early Childhood Educator Pay Scales Emergency Amendment Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-196, Nov. 10, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
